<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1053</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Just for Fun</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerade für Spaß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Juste pour l'amusement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apenas para o divertimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appena per divertimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακριβώς για τη διασκέδαση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Apenas para la diversión</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A list of activities that your learners can do just for the fun of using and learning English.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">interactive activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">list of sites</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Liste der Aktivitäten, die Ihre Anfänger 
gerade für den Spaß verwendenden und erlernenenglisch tun können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une liste d'activités que vos étudiants peuvent 
faire juste pour l'amusement de l'anglais d'utilisation et d'étude.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma lista das atividades que seus learners podem 
fazer apenas para o divertimento do inglês se usando e de 
aprendizagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una lista delle attività che i vostri 
principianti possono fare appena per il divertimento dell'inglese 
usando ed imparante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας κατάλογος δραστηριοτήτων που οι αρχάριοί σας 
μπορούν να κάνουν ακριβώς για τη διασκέδαση της χρησιμοποίησης 
και της εκμάθησης των αγγλικών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una lista de las actividades que sus principiantes
pueden hacer apenas para la diversión del inglés que usa y que 
aprende.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktive Aktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liste der Sites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">activité interactive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">liste de sites</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atividade interativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lista dos locais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attività interattiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lista dei luoghi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογική δραστηριότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατάλογος περιοχών</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lista de sitios</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
